name: Card Jumper
description:
A Card-based Puzzle Platformer!

CONTROLS:

KeyboardXbox ControllerPlayStation ControllerResultWASDLeft StickLeft StickMoveUAXLeft Action CardIBORight Action CardESCSTARTSTARTPause

You are dealt 2 Action Cards that you can use only once each. Once you use both of them, you get dealt 2 new Action Cards. There is no penalty for "burning" Action Cards. The Action Cards are as follows:

Action CardResultJumping JackJumpQuick QueenDash in any directionKiller KingAttack

Credits:

Jordan "Boateye" Johnson - Design + Programming

Alex Hurley - Level Design (non-tutorial levels)

1-bit Art Pack by Kenney (as mandated by Miz Jam 1)

BGM: Guardians by Art of Escapism 

Special Thanks:

Christine Fall and Marty Nivinski - Playtesting, and Audio Feedback

Riley Swingle, Sabina Zabarte, Jaryd Hutchins, Lisa Gunatileka - Playtesting and Feedback
